descriptionHtml:
Name: Sonya
Category: Companions
Version: 3.0
Date: 2012/07/07

------------------- [This is what? ] -----------------------

I was asked to make the companions using presets of some chars I had made before.
Now I have made this one - Nordling girl companion named Sonya The Pure Heart.
Class: Combat Ranger
Specialization: Archery, 1 handed weapons, Light Armor. 
Level: Calculated from 10 to 70.
Morality; No crime
Marriable, of course)))
Essential ( I was pity killing her...haha) 
Initial Weapon: No weapons
Initial Armor: No armor.  When you meet Sonya first time (or after you release her for another companion and then come back to ask her to follow you), she will be naked.  (TAKE AWAY CHILDREN FROM YOUR DISPLAY UNTIL SONYA IS BEING DRESSED ^_^!)
I let the players choose the outfits or armors for Sonya themselves)))

Change Log


07.07. 2012 - Version 3.0 added. Reference ID added location name bug fixed


22.06.2012 - Version 2.1 added - Light armor, 2handed weapons, facial bug fixed

22.06.2012 - Version 2.2 added - Combat Ranger, Stats corrected

Also Ver 2. added - Heavy Armor and 2-handed weapons specialization

22.06.2012 - Version 2.0 updated

------------------- [Location] ----------------------

Rannweig Fast, the Lower level of ruins, in the prisoners cage. You`ll find her easily because you should find evil mage and his dead assistant there.
(She is meant to be the magicians prisoner or so...I think)))
The location is strange but much  less strange than a girl walking naked in the crowded place))))

------------------- [Install] -----------------------
Copy and overwrite in Skyrim DATA folder 
NMM is recommended.
Put the checkmark at the SNSonya.esp in your launcher or NMM 

Just delete the esp.file to uninstall the mod

------------------- [Requirements] -----------------------
IMPORTANT! YOU MUST HAVE APACHI SKYHAIR V1.4!

Other mods you need for proper appearance

Better Females by Bella http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
The Eyes Of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13722
RANs Eyebrow Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5812
RANs Eyeliner Replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5701
UNP Female Body http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
Or CBBE if you use it. 
Vanilla/CBBE Skin Texture v1-8 http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554

All cheers and credits go to the modders whose mods I`ve used
Thanks  Bethesda for a great game


----------------------[Bugs]--------------------------------
The color contrast between face and body is possible. 





------------------- [Licensing / Legal] -------------
You are welcome to modify or reuse,  just give me credit.



Enjoy!
Sandraniks
author: Sandraniks
